author: trustin
msg: Preparing to port APSEDA version of ApacheDS protocol provider to MINA

author: trustin
msg: Fixed: DIRMINA-4: ProtocolDecoder receives dirty ByteBuffer in UDP mode.
IoAdapter did not discard unread part of previous ByteBuffer and called decoder.decode() with it again.
Now IoAdapter discards ByteBuffer even if the decoder didn't read all part of ByteBuffer.
If decoder couldn't decode partial ByteBuffer because the message is not complete, decoder will have to buffer it to merge with the next ByteBuffer.
